name: Triangles and Squares (Chabi)
description:
FRAMERATE UI ISSUE TO BE SOLVED IN THE NEXT UPDATE

A shooter game with top-down mechanics. The goal of the game is to defeat all 3 bosses with different difficulties.

With 10 different powerups And 2 gamemodes to choose from.  

PLEASE READ

the Game is currently in  Developement and is in a Pre-alpha build which means contents and visuals might not be final. And the story is very much Unfinished

A FAN GAME INSPIRED BY DANI PLEASE .

any bugs , suggestions or offensive content feel free contact me with my Gmail Adress - pocholomallari310@gmail.com(dont spam me please)

Not sure if Mac version works please inform me if it has any bugs

Controls
  • RMB - to shoot.
  • Move mouse cursor - to move player around.
  • Escape - to Open and close Pause menu.
  • Space - to open Player Status menu, during ingame only.

THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR PLAY TESTING
